Title: Different thalamic relationships of sensory-motor and parietal cortical fields in monkeys
Abstract: The Thalamic connectivity of areas 3b, 1 and 2 of the first somatic sensory cortex (SI) and of the adjectend areas 4, 3a and 5 has been studied in monkeys with anterograd and retrograde labeling techniques.

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde Labeling..following two injections of horseradish peroxidase in areas 1 and 2."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Injections of horseradish peroxidase in area 3b alone or in areas 1 and 2 also result in a lamella of retrogradely lebeled cells in the ventrobasal complex."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling...following three medilaterally disposed injections of horseradish peroxidase in area 3b

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Injections of horseradish peroxidase in area 3b alone or in areas 1 and 2 also result in a lamella of retrogradely lebeled cells in the ventrobasal complex."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling..following injetion of horseradish peroxidase in areas 1 and 2, spreading into anterior part of area 5."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..,retrogradely labeled large cells in the dorsal part of the ventrobasal complex.."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling..following injection of horseradish peroxidase confined to posterior parts of area 4."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..extendig through the full anteroposterior dimension of VPLo and continuing without interruption into and trough much of the extent of VLc."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling--following large injection of horseradish peroxidase in area 4."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..extendig through the full anteroposterior dimension of VPLo and continuing without interruption into and trough much of the extent of VLc."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling..following injection towards posterior part of area 5"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The slabs extend through the full anteroposterior dimension of the lateral posterior nucleus.."

@Injections.Citation: "Retrograde labeling..following injection of horseradish peroxidase in middle of area 5."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "The slabs extend through the full anteroposterior dimension of the lateral posterior nucleus.."

@Methods_Animals.Comments: Also squirrel monkeys are used in this study; these data is not collected.

@Injections.Citation: "..following 13 seperate injections of [3H] amino acids in area 1."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Larger injections made with a single point of entry in area 1 cause labeling of a curved lamella.."

@Injections.Citation: "..following two small mediolaterally disposed injections of [3H] amino acids in area 3b."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Comparably small injections of area 3b..lead to similar, single rods of labeling, often extending anteroposteriorly through VPLc

@Injections.Citation: "..in an experiment with a small injection of tritiated amino acids were made in area 3b"

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..gives rise to a single, rod-like mass of labeling some 500 micrometers in diameter and extending through the full anteroposterior extend of VPM."

@Injections.Citation: "..following a single injection of [3H] amino acids in area 1."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "This is especially true of injections in the trunk representation in which the labeld zone is situated in the posterior half of VPLc.."

@Injections.Citation: "in an experiment with a single injection of [3H] amino acids in area 3b."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..the labeling in VPLc formed a single, obliquely oriented rod, extending from a point close to the posterior pole of the nucleus,.."

@Injections.Citation: "..following injection of [3H] amino acids in posterior part of area 5."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Injetions of isotopes in the same region lead to anterograde labeling in the Thalamus, that follows the same general trand as in the retrograde labeling experiments,.."

@Injections.Citation: "..after a large, multiple injection of [3H] amino acids in area 4."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Large injections..lead to labeling in a continous lamella extending through VLc and VPLo."

@Injections.Citation: "..following injection of [3H] amino acids in posterior parts of area 4."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Injections of isotope in the part of area 4 lying adjectent to area 3a lead to transported label only in the VPLo."

@Injections.Citation: "..in an experiment in which nine seperate injections of [3H] amino acids were made in area 2."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "Larger injections of area 2, if made at a single point of penetration, cause labeling in a curved lamella extending from the dorsal to ventral surface of the ventrobasal complex."

@Injections.Citation: "Injections which,..involve more of the anteroposterior dimension of area 3b than above.."

@LabelledSites_Descriptions.Citation: "..are associated with three or more rods of labeling,.."
"..labeling of cortiothalamic fiber terminations occurs only in the ventrobasal complex."

@Methods_Animals.Comments: Also squirrel monkeys were used in this study; these data is left out; furthermore not for every cynomolgus and rhesus  monkey data is presented.

publication.title: Different thalamic relationships of sensory-motor and parietal cortical fields in monkeys
publication.abstract: The Thalamic connectivity of areas 3b, 1 and 2 of the first somatic sensory cortex (SI) and of the adjectend areas 4, 3a and 5 has been studied in monkeys with anterograd and retrograde labeling techniques.
